Res3 students, complete a performance task involving research and presentation

8.description:
Design an experiment to investigate the relationship between variables 
and their effect on measured quantities.  Students will present 
their findings in a detailed report.

Analyze historical primary sources, identify biases and arguments.

16.subject: MIL

Analyze provided military maps and compare them to historical data 
to determine the likely impact of different battles on territory.
